column1: "Speedy service at its finest. The interstellar express lane never disappoints!"
"Quick as a shooting star! Departure process smooth as silk. Kudos!"
"Whizzed through the process. Departure achieved in a celestial instant. Well done!"
"Blazingly efficient! Departure gate conquered in record time. Impressed and ready to fly!"
"Fairly standard service. Departure handled within a typical timeframe. Room for optimisation."
"Average speed, average experience. Departure procedures met expectations, nothing more."
"Delayed departure, shattered dreams. Your inefficiency turned my cosmic journey into a nightmare."
"Snail-paced service. By the time I boarded, my spaceship had already rusted."
"Seriously? I could've grown a galaxy while waiting. Missed my flight, thanks a lot."
"Unbelievably sluggish. Departure delayed so long, I aged a millennium. Epic fail."
